name: Communication
title: Communication
description: An occurrence of information being transmitted; e.g. an alert that was sent to a responsible provider, a public health agency that was notified about a reportable condition.

elements.name: Communication
elements.description: An occurrence of information being transmitted; e.g. an alert that was sent to a responsible provider, a public health agency that was notified about a reportable condition.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifiers assigned to this communication by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

elements.name: instantiatesCanonical
elements.description: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Communication.

elements.name: instantiatesUri
elements.description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this Communication.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: An order, proposal or plan fulfilled in whole or in part by this Communication.

elements.name: partOf
elements.description: Part of this action.

elements.name: inResponseTo
elements.description: Prior communication that this communication is in response to.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the transmission.

elements.name: statusReason
elements.description: Captures the reason for the current state of the Communication.

elements.name: category
elements.description: The type of message conveyed such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: Characterizes how quickly the communication must be acted upon. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine.

elements.name: medium
elements.description: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient or group that was the focus of this communication.

elements.name: topic
elements.description: Description of the purpose/content, similar to a subject line in an email.

elements.name: about
elements.description: Other resources that pertain to this communication and to which this communication should be associated.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The Encounter during which this Communication was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

elements.name: sent
elements.description: The time when this communication was sent.

elements.name: received
elements.description: The time when this communication arrived at the destination.

elements.name: recipient
elements.description: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, care team or device) which was the target of the communication.

elements.name: sender
elements.description: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which was the source of the communication.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: The reason or justification for the communication.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this communication.

elements.name: payload
elements.description: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) that was communicated to the recipient.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Additional notes or commentary about the communication by the sender, receiver or other interested parties.
